<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title1" role="article">
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title1" class="topic nested0" id="technical-papers">
<h1 class="title topictitle1" id="ariaid-title1">Technical Papers</h1>
<p class="shortdesc">Technical briefs, solution playbooks, tutorials, and other documents provide design patterns and best practices to help you deploy popular application workload solutions on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI).</p>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title2" class="topic nested1" id="management">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title2">Management and Operations Guides</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/oci-best-practices/index.html#GUID-5F2D2745-934E-409A-A7BA-D0976F727845">Best practices framework for OCI
</a>
<p>Provides best practices to design and operate cloud topologies that deliver maximum value, organized under four business goals: security and compliance, reliability and resilience, performance and cost optimization, and operational efficiency.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/design-dr/index.html">Learn about protecting your cloud topology against disasters</a>
<p>Outlines best practices for how to design and implement your application disaster recovery on OCI. </p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/design-ha">Learn about architecting a highly available cloud topology</a>
<p>Describes architectural best practices for designing high-availability solutions on OCI, including how to leverage Oracle-specific services. </p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/enterprise-manager/cloud-control/enterprise-manager-cloud-control/13.5/emcii/">Setting up Oracle Enterprise Manager 13.5 on OCI
</a>
<p>Guides you through the required steps to create a stack on OCI Resource Manager and use it to deploy a single-node or multiple-node Enterprise Manager setup.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/building-ha-apps-in-one-availability-domain.pdf">Building highly available applications in a region with one availability domain</a>
<p>Provides automated steps for building high availability into the applications that are deployed across multiple fault domains in an availability domain within OCI, using Terraform.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://www.oracle.com/a/otn/docs/database/oci-managed-comanaged-consolidation-deployment-strategies.pdf">Managed and comanaged consolidation and deployment strategies for OCI</a>
<p>Provides a strategy and methodology for consolidating applications, databases, and VMs in OCI with a focus on managed and comanaged Exadata Cloud Service, managed and comanaged Exadata Cloud@Customer, VM and bare metal DB systems, Autonomous AI Lakehouse, Autonomous AI Transaction Processing, and VMs (application and database compute capacity).</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/oracle-sovereign-cloud-principles.pdf">OCI sovereign cloud principles</a>
<p>Provides an overview of some OCI features and enhancements to consider for cloud sovereignty strategies and deployments.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title3" class="topic nested1" id="application">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title3">Application Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/perform-spatial-analysis-with-oracle-spatial-studio.pdf">Perform spatial analysis with Oracle Spatial Studio</a>
<p>Explains the practical aspects of working with datasets within the Oracle Spatial Studio environment, from loading spatial and nonspatial data to preparing datasets through geocoding and indexing to visualizing the data.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/graph-analytics-movie-recomendations.pdf">Making movie recommendations by using graph analytics</a>
<p>Describes how to use Graph Studio in Oracle Autonomous AI Database to detect and create customer communities rooted in movie-viewing behavior.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-ebusiness-suite-oci/index.html">Learn about deploying Oracle E-Business Suite on OCI</a>
<p>Provides information for planning a multiple-host, secure, high-availability topology for provisioning Oracle E-Business Suite on OCI or migrating Oracle E-Business Suite environments from your data center to OCI. See also <a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/terraform-cloud-infrastructure-ebusiness-suite/index.html">Set up infrastructure components for deploying Oracle E-Business Suite</a>.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/learn-architecture-deploy-peoplesoft/index.html">Learn about deploying PeopleSoft on OCI
</a>
<p>Provides information for planning a multiple-host, secure, high-availability topology for provisioning Oracle PeopleSoft applications on OCI or migrating PeopleSoft environments from your data center to OCI.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/migrating_sap_netweaver_to_exadata_cloud_solutions.pdf">Migrating SAP NetWeaver based systems within the scope
                    of Oracle Databases</a>
<p>Provides the common methods and necessary steps for migrating systems based on
                    SAP NetWeaver within the scope of Oracle Databases. Migration methods specific
                    to Oracle Multitenant and Oracle Recovery Manager (RMAN) are discussed in
                    detail.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/exacs_x11m_sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_service.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java with Oracle Exadata Database Service based on Oracle Exadata Infrastructure X11M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform on the Oracle Exadata Database Service, based on Oracle Exadata Cloud Infrastructure X11M running Oracle Linux 8.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/exacs_x9m_sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_service.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on Oracle Exadata Database Service based on Oracle Exadata Infrastructure X9M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform on the Oracle Exadata Database Service, based on Oracle Exadata Cloud Infrastructure X9M running Oracle Linux 7.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/exacs_x8m_sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_service.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on Oracle Exadata Cloud Service based on Oracle Exadata X8M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform on the Oracle Database Exadata Cloud Service, based on Oracle Exadata X8M hardware and using Oracle Linux 7, in OCI.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_at_customer_x9m.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java with Oracle
                    Exadata Cloud@Customer X9M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP
                    NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform with Oracle Exadata
                    Cloud@Customer X9M.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_at_customer_x10m.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java with Oracle Exadata Cloud@Customer X10M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform with Oracle Exadata Cloud@Customer X10M.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_at_customer_x11m.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java with Oracle Exadata Cloud@Customer X11M</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform with Oracle Exadata Cloud@Customer X11M.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/exacs_azure_x9m_sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_cloud_service.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java with Oracle Database@Azure</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying Oracle Databases of the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform on Oracle Database@Azure, based on Oracle Exadata Cloud Infrastructure X9M running Oracle Linux 8 on the VM cluster nodes.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap-netweaver-application-server-abap-java-on-oci-e5.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, version 3.0</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, covering E4 and later bare metal and VM flex shapes.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap-netweaver-application-server-abap-java-on-oci-v_3_1.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, version 3.1</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, covering E4 and E5 bare metal and VM flex shapes and Oracle Linux 8 and 9.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sap-netweaver-application-server-abap-java-on-oci-v_3_2.pdf">SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, version 3.2</a>
<p>Provides suggested best practices for deploying SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java on OCI, covering E6, E5, and E4 bare metal and VM flex shapes, and Oracle Linux 8 and 9.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/data_guard_sap_netweaver_app_server_abap_java_on_exadata_database_service.pdf">Oracle Data Guard 19c and SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java</a>
<p>Provides a complementary guide for customers who are running the SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP/Java platform on Oracle Exadata Database Service and want to configure Oracle Data Guard within their SAP landscape.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title4" class="topic nested1" id="crosscloud">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title4">Cross-Cloud Interconnect: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and Microsoft Azure</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/sso-e-business-suite-azure-ad/index.html#GUID-2158E04D-B7A8-4122-8591-965671369CB4">Set up SSO between Azure AD and Oracle Identity
                    Cloud Service for Oracle E-Business Suite</a>
<p>Describes the cross-cloud architecture for E-Business Suite deployed in OCI and
                    Microsoft Azure, and how to configure federated single sign-on using Oracle
                    Identity Cloud Service and Azure Active Directory.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/sso-azure-oam-ebs/index.html#GUID-9159516E-7134-4CDE-9DB6-B12B7069B050">Set up SSO between Azure AD and Oracle Access
                    Manager for Oracle E-Business Suite</a>
<p>Describes the cross-cloud architecture for E-Business Suite deployed in OCI and
                    Microsoft Azure, and how to configure federated single sign-on using Oracle
                    Access Manager and Azure Active Directory.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/sso-azure-oam-merch/index.html#GUID-E9A598C4-0864-4268-9433-123C8CD12F65">Set up SSO between Azure AD and Oracle Access
                    Manager for Oracle Retail Merchandising Suite</a>
<p>Describes the cross-cloud architecture for Oracle Retail Merchandising Suite
                    deployed in OCI and Microsoft Azure, and how to configure federated single
                    sign-on using Oracle Access Manager and Azure Active Directory.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title5" class="topic nested1" id="networking">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title5">Networking Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/learn-oci-network-firewall-with-examples.pdf">Learn OCI Network Firewall with examples</a>
<p>Provides an in-depth exploration of the OCI Network Firewall service, emphasizing its role in securing network traffic, detecting and preventing threats, and enforcing security policies.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/learn-routing-in-oci-networking-with-examples.pdf">Learn routing in OCI Networking with examples</a>
<p>Explains routing in OCI cloud networks by introducing and discussing basic OCI routing functions, and then providing in-depth typical use cases in different deployment scenarios.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/connectivity-redundancy-guide.pdf">Connectivity redundancy guide</a>
<p>Helps you check your current deployment for redundancy or upgrade a single connection to OCI to a redundant connection.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/ipsec-vpn-best-practices.pdf">Site-to-Site VPN (IPSec) best practices</a>
<p>Provides best practices for how to connect your on-premises network to OCI with the most success by using Site-to-Site VPN over the internet.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/sdn-integration-with-nuage-networks.pdf">SDN Integration with Nuage Networks</a>
<p>Provides instructions for deploying the Nuage Networks from Nokia software-defined networking (SDN) solution within OCI.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title6" class="topic nested1" id="compute">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title6">Compute Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/creating-active-directory-domain-services-in-oci.pdf">Creating Active Directory domain services in OCI
</a>
<p>Walks through the process of creating an Active Directory environment in an OCI tenancy.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-kubernetes/index.html">Set up a Kubernetes cluster for deploying
                    containerized applications</a>
<p>Provides Terraform building blocks for deploying the infrastructure required for
                    a cloud-based Kubernetes environment.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title7" class="topic nested1" id="security">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title7">Security Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://www.oracle.com/a/ocom/docs/oracle-cloud-infrastructure-security-architecture.pdf">Oracle Cloud Infrastructure security architecture</a>
<p>Provides an overview of security architecture in OCI.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/best-practices-for-iam-on-oci.pdf">Best practices for Identity and Access Management (IAM) in OCI</a>
<p>Provides best practices for using the IAM service when you're planning, designing, and deploying solutions on OCI.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/oci-iam-oauth-flows-best-practices.pdf">IAM Identity Domain OAuth and OpenID Connect flows and best practices</a>
<p>Describes the various flows and best practices of using OCI
IAM identity domains with OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://www.oracle.com/a/ocom/docs/ncsc-cloud-security-principles.pdf">National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC) cloud
                    security principles and implementation in Oracle Cloud</a>
<p>Summarizes 14 essential NCSC principles to consider when evaluating cloud
                    services, and provides context for why these principles might be important to an
                    organization.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://www.oracle.com/a/ocom/docs/whitepaper-zero-trust-security-oci.pdf">Approaching Zero Trust Security with OCI</a>
<p>Describes how OCI can help organizations adopt a zero trust security model as recommended by the UK National Cyber Security Centre's eight principles.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/oracle-web-application-firewall-for-saas.pdf">Oracle Web Application Firewall for SaaS: Oracle Cloud’s frontline defense</a>
<p>Describes how Oracle SaaS Cloud Security can help organizations protect applications with web application firewalls as a frontline defense by building resilience against cyberthreats and reinforcing overall cloud security.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/oracle-access-governance-secure-higher-ed.pdf">Securing higher education institutions with Oracle Access Governance</a>
<p>Examines how Oracle Access Governance addresses critical security challenges in higher education by providing a framework for robust identity management and risk mitigation.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/transition-from-oracle-identity-governance-to-access-governance.pdf">Transitioning from Oracle Identity Governance to Oracle Access Governance</a>
<p>Provides a comprehensive guide for organizations that are currently using Oracle Identity Governance and are considering a transition to Oracle Access Governance.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title8" class="topic nested1" id="compliance">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title8">Compliance Advisories</h2>
<div class="body">
<p>Oracle provides general information about compliance frameworks in the form of <em>advisories</em>. These advisories help you to determine the suitability of using specific Oracle cloud services and to implement specific technical controls to meet compliance obligations. For more information about advisories and a complete list of them, see <a class="xref" href="https://www.oracle.com/corporate/cloud-compliance/#advisory">Oracle Cloud Compliance</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title9" class="topic nested1" id="data">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title9">Data Management Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/ha-cassandra-cluster/index.html">Deploy a highly available Apache Cassandra cluster</a>
<p>Provides a reference architecture and Terraform for a six-node deployment of an Apache Cassandra cluster running on OCI Compute instances.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-redis-cluster/">Deploy a highly available, distributed cache using Redis</a>
<p>Provides a reference architecture and Terraform for a typical six-node deployment of a Redis cluster running on OCI Compute instances.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/middleware/goldengate/core/23/oggmp/index.html">Using Oracle GoldenGate on Oracle Cloud</a>
<p>Provides information about how to deploy Oracle GoldenGate Microservices on OCI. For information about Maximum Availability Architecture (MAA) for Oracle GoldenGate Hub on Oracle Cloud, see <a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/database/oracle/oracle-database/26/haovw/cloud-gghub.html">Cloud: Configuring Oracle GoldenGate Hub</a>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title10" class="topic nested1" id="storage">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title10">Storage Solutions</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/access-object-storage-with-preauthenticated-links.pdf">Accessing OCI
Object Storage with pre-authenticated links</a>
<p>Provides step-by-step instructions for creating a bucket in OCI
Object Storage, uploading a sample object to the bucket, and creating a pre-authenticated link for access to that object.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/hdfs-connector-oci-object-storage-performance-big-data.pdf">HDFS Connector for OCI Object Storage unlocks performance for big data</a>
<p>Explains how OCI
Object Storage and the HDFS connector can be used as a replacement for a self-managed HDFS cluster, and provides performance comparisons with the previous versions of the connector and with a very large on-premises Hadoop cluster.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/move-data-to-cloud-storage-using-rclone/index.html">Move data to Object Storage in the cloud by using rclone</a>
<p>Describes how to use rclone to transfer large amounts of unstructured data like videos, backups, and logs from cloud or on-premises sources to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Object Storage.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/file-storage-performance-guide.pdf">File Storage service performance guide</a>
<p>Describes the performance of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
File Storage.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/scale-out-oci-file-storage-performance-for-data-intensive-workloads.pdf">Scale out OCI File Storage performance for AI/ML and data-intensive workloads</a>
<p>Describes how to use DNS round robin to dynamically assign mount targets to clients, and how to configure DNS round robin with OCI’s fully managed DNS for virtual cloud networks (VCNs).</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Resources/Assets/whitepapers/running-benchmarks-on-oci-file-storage-with-lustre.pdf">Running Benchmarks on OCI File Storage with Lustre</a>
<p>Provides in-depth technical guidance for running standardized benchmarks for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) File Storage with Lustre to evaluate throughput, IOPS, and metadata operations in real-world, large-scale environments</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title11" class="topic nested1" id="storage-5">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title11">VMware Solution</h2>
<div class="body">
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-zerto-for-ocvs/index.html#GUID-53CCF4BB-DF8D-4200-9382-89154A0B8BE3">Deploy Zerto to protect your VMware SDDC in the cloud against disasters</a>
<p>Learn how to deploy Zerto to protect your Oracle Cloud VMware SDDC data in the cloud.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-veeam-for-ocvs/index.html#GUID-8109D7EA-F842-4339-B8B7-8AA1F11F10AE">Deploy Veeam to protect your VMware SDDC in the cloud against disasters</a>
<p>Learn how to deploy Veeam to protect your Oracle Cloud VMware SDDC data in the cloud.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-actifio-oracle-vmware-solution/index.html#GUID-C5720B62-045F-418F-9E8C-FFE3799FB103">Deploy Actifio to protect your VMware SDDC in the cloud against disasters</a>
<p>Learn how you can configure Actifio backup and disaster recovery solution for guest VMs in Oracle Cloud VMware Solution.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/deploy-vmware-sddc-oci/index.html">Deploy a highly available SDDC to the
                    cloud</a>
<p>Shows you how to deploy a VMware SDDC on OCI and then integrate it with other
                    Oracle services running on Oracle Cloud.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/migrate-vmware-workloads-oraclecloud/index.html">Migrate your on-premises VMware workloads to the
                    cloud</a>
<p>Outlines the process of online, or live, migration of your VMware workloads from
                    an on-premises data center environment to Oracle Cloud VMware Solution.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/hybrid-ocvs-sddc-onprem-sddc-cloud/index.html">Build a hybrid SDDC by extending your on-premises VMware deployment to Oracle Cloud</a>
<p>Describes how to set up a hybrid VMware SDDC between your on-premises environment and OCI by using Oracle Cloud VMware Solution.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/connect-oraclecloud-vmware-resources/index.html">Learn about connecting to Oracle Cloud and VMware
                    resources</a>
<p>Describes several methods for connecting to your Oracle Cloud and VMware
                    resources, plus their benefits, limitations, and how to get started.</p>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/solutions/implement-dr-for-ocvs/index.html">Implement disaster recovery for an Oracle Cloud
                    VMware Solution SDDC on the cloud</a>
<p>Describes how Oracle Cloud VMware Solution uses VMware Site Recovery Manager
                    (SRM) to implement an automated, reliable, and flexible disaster recovery
                    solution for your VMware SDDC.</p>
</li>
<li>

<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title1" role="article">
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title1" class="topic concept nested0" id="overview">
<h1 class="title topictitle1" id="ariaid-title1">Billing and Cost Management Overview</h1>
<div class="body conbody"><p class="shortdesc">
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure provides various billing and cost management tools that make it easy to manage your service costs. You can estimate costs, create budgets to set spending thresholds, view cost reports, and visualize your spending with charts and reports. View your subscription details, invoices, usage statements, payment history, manage your payment method, and earn rewards.</p>
<div class="p">
<div class="uk-alert uk-alert-warning"><span class="vl-1px-up" uk-icon="lifesaver"></span><strong> Tip</strong><br/><br/> Watch a <a class="xref" href="https://apexapps.oracle.com/pls/apex/f?p=44785:265:0:::265:P265_CONTENT_ID:31876">video introduction</a> to the service.</div>
</div>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">FinOps Hub</h2>
<p>Use the OCI
<strong class="ph uicontrol">FinOps Hub</strong> to get an overall view of the most common cost management features. View subscription usage, costs by region, compartment, and product description. Create budgets to set limits on your spending and manage forecast spending, and optimize costs using <strong class="ph uicontrol">Cloud Advisor</strong> functionality. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="FinOps.htm" title="Use the Console's Cost Management FinOps Hub to get an overall view of the most common cost management features, and as the central location for cost management resources in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure." uk-tooltip="">Using OCI FinOps Hub</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Billing and Usage on the Console Home Page</h2>
<p>You can get a snapshot of billing and usage, and check your balance, on the Console home page. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/GSG/Concepts/console_topic-AccountCenter-Billing.htm">Viewing Billing Details</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">
Console Dashboards Integration</h2>
<p>You can use Console Dashboards to get a quick view of billing and cost management information in your tenancy. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="dashboards-billing-widgets.htm" title="You can use Console Dashboards to get a quick view of billing and cost management information in your tenancy." uk-tooltip="">Console Dashboards Integration</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Cost Estimator</h2>
<p>The Cloud Cost Estimator helps you figure out your estimated monthly usage and costs for Oracle's Infrastructure and Platform Cloud services, before you commit to an amount. See <a class="xref" href="../Tasks/signingup_topic-Estimating_Costs.htm" title="Oracle provides you with a cost estimator to help you figure out your monthly usage and costs for Oracle's Infrastructure and Platform Cloud (Oracle IaaS/PaaS) services before you commit to an amount." uk-tooltip="">Estimating Monthly Costs</a> for more information.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Budgets</h2>
<p>Use Budgets to set thresholds for your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure spending. You can set alerts on your budget to let you know when you might exceed your budget, and you can view all of your budgets and spending from one single place in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Console. See <a class="xref" href="budgetsoverview.htm" title="Use budgets to set soft limits on your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure spending. You can set alerts on your budget to let you know when you might exceed your budget, and you can view all your budgets and spending from one single place in the Console." uk-tooltip="">Budgets</a> for more information.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Cost Analysis</h2>
<p>
Cost Analysis is a visualization tool that helps you track and optimize your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure spending, allows you to generate charts, and download accurate, reliable tabular reports of aggregated cost data on your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure consumption. Use the tool for spot checks of spending trends and for generating reports. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="costanalysisoverview.htm" title="Cost Analysis is an easy-to-use visualization tool to help you track and optimize your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure spending. You can generate charts, and download accurate, reliable tabular reports of aggregated cost data on your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure consumption." uk-tooltip="">Cost Analysis</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Scheduled Reports</h2>
<p>Use the <strong class="ph uicontrol">Scheduled reports</strong> page to generate scheduled reports based on <a class="xref" href="costanalysisoverview.htm#saving_reports" title="Use the Report actions menu in Cost Analysis to create a saved report. You can later access the report after leaving the Console and returning to Cost Analysis, without needing to respecify your set of dates, filters, granularity, or grouping dimensions. After a report has been saved, it can later be renamed, updated, or deleted. A maximum of 10 reports can be saved." uk-tooltip="">saved reports</a> from Cost Analysis. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="scheduledreportoverview.htm" title="You can generate scheduled reports based on saved reports from Cost Analysis." uk-tooltip="">Scheduled Reports</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Cost Reports</h2>
<p>On the Cost and Usage Reports page, you can download <a class="xref" href="costusagereportsoverview.htm#costreports">cost reports</a> that indicate the cost of resource consumption. Industry-standard FOCUS CSV cost reports, which conform to the <a aria-label="FinOps Open Cost &amp; Usage Specification (FOCUS). Opens in a new window" class="xref" href="https://focus.finops.org/#specification" rel="noopener" target="_blank">FinOps Open Cost &amp; Usage Specification (FOCUS)</a>, are also generated and available for download. </p>
<p>For more information, see <a class="xref" href="costusagereportsoverview.htm" title="Cost reports are comma-separated value (CSV) files and reflect the cost of resource consumption. They're generated daily and are stored in an Object Storage bucket. Use the Cost and Usage Reports page to download and access the reports." uk-tooltip="">Cost Reports</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Subscriptions</h2>
<p>Use the <strong class="ph uicontrol">Subscriptions</strong> page to view subscriptions detail, usage information, billing schedule, and <strong title="The per-unit rate that a customer is charged." uk-tooltip="">rate card <span class="vl-1px-up" uk-icon="icon: info; ratio: .8"></span></strong> information. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="subscriptions.htm" title="The Subscriptions page provides subscriptions detail, usage information, billing schedule, and information." uk-tooltip="">Subscriptions</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Invoices</h2>
<p>You can pay invoices, and view and download invoices for your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure usage on the <strong class="ph uicontrol">Invoices</strong> page. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="invoices.htm" title="Use the Invoices page to track and monitor your Oracle Universal Credits invoice activity." uk-tooltip="">Invoices</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Usage Statements</h2>
<p>Download and view usage statements that show your monthly subscription usage. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="usagestatements.htm" title="Use the Usage Statements page to view statements which are generated monthly and show your subscription usage." uk-tooltip="">Usage Statements</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Payment History</h2>
<p>Use the <strong class="ph uicontrol">Payment History</strong> page to track and monitor your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure paid invoice history. Only <em>paid</em> invoices are shown on this page. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="paymenthistory.htm" title="Use the Payment History page to track and monitor your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure paid invoice history. Only paid invoices are shown, in contrast to the Invoices page, which shows all invoices." uk-tooltip="">Payment History</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Account Upgrades and Payment Method</h2>
<p>Use the <strong class="ph uicontrol">Upgrade and Manage Payment</strong> section of the Console to manage how you pay for your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure usage. For more information, see <a class="xref" href="../Tasks/changingpaymentmethod.htm" title="On the Upgrade and Manage Payment page, you can: upgrade to a paid account, request to upgrade a paid account to corporate, update address or contact info for a corporate account, change your payment method, and request a sales call." uk-tooltip="">Managing Account Upgrades and Payment Method</a>.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Oracle Support Rewards</h2>
<p>Oracle Support Rewards lets you earn rewards when using OCI services. Rewards can be applied to pay for support contracts that you have for other eligible on-premises Oracle products. See <a class="xref" href="supportrewardsoverview.htm" title="With Oracle Support Rewards, you can earn rewards when using Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services, and those rewards can be applied to pay for support contracts that customers have for other eligible on-premises Oracle products." uk-tooltip="">Oracle Support Rewards Overview</a> for more information.</p>
</section>
<section class="section"><h2 class="title sectiontitle vl-no-in-page-toc">Organizations and Billing Integration</h2>
<p>You can use the Oracle billing and cost reporting features to centrally manage the cost and usage information across all tenancies in your <a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/organization_management_overview.htm">organization</a>.</p>
<p>See <a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/General/Concepts/organization_management_overview.htm#organization_management_cost_reporting">Cost Reporting Integration</a> and <a class="xref" href="costanalysisoverview.htm#viewing_subscription_details" title="Tenancies can view their subscription details, depending on the type of tenancy. You can also use the Subscription ID grouping dimension to view costs in terms of a tenancy's subscription." uk-tooltip="">Viewing Subscription Details and Costs</a> for more information.</p>
</section>
</div>
<article aria-labelledby="ariaid-title2" class="topic nested1" id="Required">
<h2 class="title topictitle2 vl-include-in-page-toc" id="ariaid-title2">Required IAM Policy</h2>
<div class="body">
<p>To enable users to use Billing and Cost Management tools and monitor the costs associated with your account, you must grant them access by writing a <strong title='An Identity and Access Management (IAM) document that specifies who has what type of access to your resources. Policy can refer to several types of documents: an individual statement written in the policy language, a collection of statements in a single named "policy" document, and the overall body of policies that your organization uses to control access to resources.' uk-tooltip="">policy <span class="vl-1px-up" uk-icon="icon: info; ratio: .8"></span></strong>. If you're new to policies, see <a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Identity/policiesgs/get-started-with-policies.htm">Getting Started with Policies</a> and <a class="xref" href="/iaas/Content/Identity/policiescommon/commonpolicies.htm">Common Policies</a>. </p>
<p>See the corresponding required IAM policy topics for each Billing and Cost Management feature: </p>
<ul>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="../Tasks/changingpaymentmethod.htm#Required_IAM_Policy">Upgrade and Manage Payment</a>.</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="billingtoolsoverview.htm#subs_inv_paymenthist_required_IAM_policy">Subscriptions, Invoices, Payment History, and Usage Statements</a>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="budgetsoverview.htm#policy">Budgets</a>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="costusagereportsoverview.htm#policy">Cost and Usage Reports</a>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="costanalysisoverview.htm#policy">Cost Analysis</a>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="supportrewardsoverview.htm#supportrewards_required_IAM_policy">Oracle Support Rewards</a>
</li>
<li>
<a class="xref" href="scheduledreportoverview.htm#scheduledreports_required_IAM_policy">Scheduled Reports</a>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>
</article>
